trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> to a string.
It also converts a string to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
The FontUnitConverter class is used to convert data to and from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> and string types.
> [!CAUTION] > You should never access a type converter directly.
Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor?displayProperty=fullName>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter?displayProperty=fullName> base class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether a data type can be converted to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
Use the CanConvertFrom method to determine whether the data type specified by the `sourceType` parameter can be converted to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
> [!NOTE] > This method will return true only if the `sourceType` is <xref:System.String>.
The only type this converter can convert into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> is <xref:System.String>.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> implemented object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the data type to check.
if the data type specified by the sourceType parameter can be converted to a ; otherwise, .
Returns a value indicating whether the converter can convert a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object to the specified type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context of the object to convert.
A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the data type to convert to.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter supports converting a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object to the destination type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
This method will return true only if the destinationType is .
The only type this converter can convert <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> into is <xref:System.String>.
Converts an object to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> in a specific culture.
Use the ConvertFrom method to convert the object specified by the `value` parameter to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> in the culture specified by the `culture` parameter.
> [!NOTE] > If the specified object is `null`, the returned value is also `null`.
Similarly, if the specified object is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Empty> is returned.
> [!NOTE] > This method can only convert a string to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> implemented object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> that specifies the culture to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>, when it is expressed in points.
The object to convert to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the converted value.
Converts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> to an object with a different data type.
Use the ConvertTo method to convert the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> specified by the `value` parameter to an object with the data type specified by the `destinationType` parameter.
> [!NOTE] > <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned from this method if the `value` parameter contains `null`.

<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is also returned if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> specified by the `value` parameter contains the value `FontSize.NotSet`.
> [!NOTE] > This method can only convert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> to a string.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> implemented object that provides information about the context of a type converter.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> that specifies the culture to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>, when it is expressed in points.
A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> to convert.
A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the data type to convert to.
A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the converted value.

Returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> containing the standard values for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>, using the specified format context.

Use the GetStandardValues method to retrieve a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> containing the standard values for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>.
This collection contains all the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> class.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about the context of a type converter.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> containing the standard values for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref>.

Returns whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues*> method is an exclusive list of values, using the specified format context.

Use the GetStandardValuesExclusive method to determine whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection?displayProperty=fullName> returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is an exclusive list of values.
This method is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the list of values is not an exclusive list.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about the context of a type converter.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.

Returns whether the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter"></xref> class that this method is called from supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified format context.

Use the GetStandardValuesSupported method to determine whether the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnitConverter> class that this method is called from supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified format context.
This method is overridden to always return `true` to indicate that this class supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about the context of a type converter.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for all cases.
